channel.title: How long you've been here and the funniest thing you've seen on the BM forums
channel.description: Hey, I've been hanging around here for a year now and I've seen references to all kinds of entertaining sounding stories from the older members. Post how long you've been on the forums and the funniest thing you've seen here. Examples, Swampfox, something Eric did (idk he sounds like a funny guy :slight_smile: ), etc.

item.title: How long you've been here and the funniest thing you've seen on the BM forums
item.dc:creator: SVD1
item.description:
I’ve lurked around this forums since 06-07, registered in 08. remember the xen art community project, not anything interesting like that any longer on the forums, mostly just “when will it be done” and “what will you do when it is released”, at last it seems there are no more questions about helmets, mirrors and casseroles

Read full topic
item.source: How long you've been here and the funniest thing you've seen on the BM forums

item.title: How long you've been here and the funniest thing you've seen on the BM forums
item.dc:creator: Collision
item.description:
jambo:

I joined many moons ago.

Funniest was probably the source comics on leak-free, the ram ‘n’ jam stuff, 3vil, hotnumbers, BlackOps and his manifesto (still have a copy of it somewhere at home) and so many other things.

If only LM stopped doing this ‘Life’ thing I keep hearing about, came back to the forums and posted all the old comics.

Read full topic
item.source: How long you've been here and the funniest thing you've seen on the BM forums

item.title: How long you've been here and the funniest thing you've seen on the BM forums
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
I joined in early '05 I think, and was a solid member until 2008. Since I’ve re-joined, I’ve been very random about when I actually come and lurk. (and occasionally post)

One of the funniest things I’ve seen here was Psyborg’s comic. It was an emotional short story about a bleak future, and then out of nowhere, BAM! Kool-Aid man busting through the wall, and it all worked so well.

I’ve missed pretty much all of the recent shitpostings designed to scare certain unwanted members away, so I feel empty inside

Read full topic
item.source: How long you've been here and the funniest thing you've seen on the BM forums

item.title: How long you've been here and the funniest thing you've seen on the BM forums
item.dc:creator: mental2k
item.description:
Think I first joined a forum waaay back in about 2005, then I sort of forgot about it, checking in occasionally when I remembered it. Then came back on a more permanent basis last year.

Swampfox was mildly amusing.

Read full topic
item.source: How long you've been here and the funniest thing you've seen on the BM forums

item.title: How long you've been here and the funniest thing you've seen on the BM forums
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
bigfan421:

I lurked during the later part of the Gamernode years, made an account on the Iteration of the forums that followed, sent the confirmation Email to the wrong Email address with that account, created my current account before the '09 crash and the rest is history.
Funniest thing I remember is Danny Smith. Man, that kid couldn’t take a joke (or ignore obvious trolling for that matter)

Yeah, Danny Smith even requested to have me banned… permanent.

Read full topic

item.title: How long you've been here and the funniest thing you've seen on the BM forums
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
I’ve been around these forums since the very first iteration - the one right after Black Mesa split from LeakFree. (Five years ago? Six? Hell if I know.)

And the funniest thing I’ve ever seen on these forums - hands down - was the “GORDON” thread.

Read full topic
